程序包 com.academic_assistant.service

类 PostService

java.lang.Object
com.academic_assistant.service.PostService
@Service public class PostService extends Object
Service class for handling post-related operations.

    • PostService

      public PostService(PostRepository postRepository, UserRepository userRepository, TagRepository tagRepository, CommentRepository commentRepository, ReplyRepository replyRepository)
      Service class for handling post-related operations.

  • 方法详细资料

    • post

      public String post(String jsonString)
      Creates a new post based on the provided JSON string.
      参数:
      jsonString - a JSON string representing the post details
      返回:
      true if the post was successfully created, false otherwise

    • delete

      public boolean delete(String jsonString)
      Deletes a post.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing post ID.
      返回:
      true if the post is successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • getAllPost

      public String getAllPost(String watcher)
      Retrieves all posts.
      参数:
      watcher - User ID of the watcher.
      返回:
      JSON string of all posts.

    • getRecommendPost

      public String getRecommendPost(String watcher)
      Retrieves recommended posts for a user.
      参数:
      watcher - User ID of the watcher.
      返回:
      JSON string of recommended posts.

    • getAllFollowPost

      public String getAllFollowPost(String watcher)
      Retrieves posts from followed users.
      参数:
      watcher - User ID of the watcher.
      返回:
      JSON string of posts from followed users.

    • getPostByTag

      public String getPostByTag(String tagRequest)
      Retrieves posts by tags.
      参数:
      tagRequest - JSON string containing tags.
      返回:
      JSON string of posts by tags.

    • followTag

      public String followTag(String jsonString)
      Follows a tag.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing tag name and user ID.
      返回:
      JSON string of followed tags.

    • unfollowTag

      public String unfollowTag(String jsonString)
      Unfollows a tag.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing tag name and user ID.
      返回:
      JSON string of followed tags.

    • getPostByFollow

      public String getPostByFollow(String tagRequest)
      Retrieves posts from followed users.
      参数:
      tagRequest - JSON string containing followed user IDs and user ID.
      返回:
      JSON string of posts from followed users.

    • getPostByUser

      public String getPostByUser(String userRequest)
      Retrieves posts by a user.
      参数:
      userRequest - JSON string containing user ID.
      返回:
      JSON string of posts by the user.

    • likePost

      public boolean likePost(String jsonString)
      Likes a post.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing post ID and user ID.
      返回:
      true if the post is successfully liked, false otherwise.

    • unlikePost

      public boolean unlikePost(String jsonString)
      Unlikes a post.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing post ID and user ID.
      返回:
      true if the post is successfully unliked, false otherwise.

    • collectPost

      public boolean collectPost(String jsonString)
      Collects a post for a user.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing post ID and user ID.
      返回:
      true if the post is successfully collected, false otherwise.

    • uncollectPost

      public boolean uncollectPost(String jsonString)
      Uncollects a post for a user.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing post ID and user ID.
      返回:
      true if the post is successfully uncollected, false otherwise.

    • getUserLike

      public String getUserLike(String jsonString)
      Retrieves all posts liked by a user.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing user ID.
      返回:
      JSON string of all liked posts.

    • getUserCollect

      public String getUserCollect(String jsonString)
      Retrieves all posts collected by a user.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing user ID.
      返回:
      JSON string of all collected posts.

    • existLike

      public Boolean existLike(String jsonString)
      Checks if a user likes a post.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing post ID and user ID.
      返回:
      true if the user likes the post, false otherwise.

    • submitComment

      public boolean submitComment(String jsonString)
      Submits a comment to a post.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing post ID, user ID, and content.
      返回:
      true if the comment is successfully submitted, false otherwise.

    • getCommentByPost

      public String getCommentByPost(String jsonString)
      Retrieves comments for a post.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing post ID.
      返回:
      JSON string of all comments for the post.

    • deleteComment

      public boolean deleteComment(String jsonString)
      Deletes a comment.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing comment ID.
      返回:
      true if the comment is successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • submitReply

      public boolean submitReply(String jsonString)
      Submits a reply to a comment or another reply.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing comment ID, user ID, content, and optionally reply ID.
      返回:
      true if the reply is successfully submitted, false otherwise.

    • deleteReply

      public boolean deleteReply(String jsonString)
      Deletes a reply.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing reply ID.
      返回:
      true if the reply is successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • getReplyByComment

      public String getReplyByComment(String jsonString)
      Retrieves replies for a comment.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing comment ID.
      返回:
      JSON string of all replies for the comment.

    • getReplyByReply

      public String getReplyByReply(String jsonString)
      Retrieves replies for another reply.
      参数:
      jsonString - JSON string containing reply ID.
      返回:
      JSON string of all replies for the reply.

    • getAllTag

      public String getAllTag()
      Retrieves all tags.
      返回:
      JSON string of all tags.

    • getFollowTags

      public String getFollowTags(String userID)
      Retrieves tags followed by a user.
      参数:
      userID - User ID.
      返回:
      JSON string of followed tags.

    • searchPost

      public String searchPost(String jsonString)
      Search posts by related content.
      参数:
      jsonString - the input of the search.
      返回:
      JSON string of related post.

    • postProcess

      public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject postProcess(Post post, User user)
      Processes a post to JSON with additional user-specific information.
      参数:
      post - Post to be processed.
      user - User for whom the post is being processed.
      返回:
      JSON object representing the processed post.
